description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as gym/games room/store.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 2021/010 -01OBC, 2021/010 -02OBC.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be as specified in section 8 of the submitted planning application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, London Plan (2021) policy D3, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 7 Hawtrey Avenue, Northolt only and not for any other use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the  site and to ensure that the  use of the building does not, by reason  of  any  other  activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document  (2013), policy D6 of  the  London  Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The existing outbuildings shown to be removed on the approved plans shall be demolished in their entirety and the resultant debris removed from site prior to first occupation of the outbuilding hereby approved.

Reason: In the interests of the visual amenity and character of the surroundings, in accordance with Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, London Plan (2021) policy D3, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
